title: Reincarnated as a Dragon’s Egg ～Lets Aim to Be the Strongest～ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Seinen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Appearance Changes   Beast Companions   Calm Protagonist   Cooking   Death of Loved Ones   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Evolution   Fantasy Creatures   Game Elements   Gods   Heroes   Indecisive Protagonist   Level System   Loli   Long Separations   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated as a Monster   Saints   Shapeshifters   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Nekoko   猫子
description:
I woke up in an unknown forest.

It seemed like this place was a fantasy world where strange-looking beasts ran rampant. And just like in a game, I seemed to be able to check my enemies’ and my ability.

Let’s hunt monsters and gather titles in order to level up and evolve into a Greater Dragon!

And I heard a mysterious voice in my head, “Let’s aim to be the strongest!”>
